query:
INSERT INTO seasonalEvents (name, description, gameMode, startDate, endDate, rewards, isActive) VALUES
('Valentine Madness', 'Double points on all games for 7 days', 'double_points', NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), JSON_OBJECT('bits', 200, 'aiCredits', 50), true),
('Spring Speedrun', 'Complete Snake in under 30 seconds for bonus rewards', 'speedrun', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), JSON_OBJECT('bits', 300, 'aiCredits', 100), true),
('Summer Blitz', 'Play 10 games daily to unlock exclusive cosmetics', 'daily_quest', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 21 DAY), JSON_OBJECT('bits', 500, 'cosmetic', 'summer_theme'), true);
command:

('Valentine Madness', 'Double points on all games for 7 days', 'double_points', NOW(), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), JSON_OBJECT('bits', 200, 'aiCredits', 50), true),
